snippet: Coalition forces in Afghanistan are investigating the death of a tribal leader who was shot at a military base after being questioned and released.
abstract: Coalition forces in Afghanistan are investigating the death of tribal leader Mirza M Khan, wanted man who was shot at military base after being questioned and released.

byline.original: By ALISSA J. RUBIN and TAIMOOR SHAH
byline.contributor: Alissa J. Rubin reported from Kabul, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan. Habib Zahori contributed reporting from Kabul.

lead_paragraph: Coalition forces in Afghanistan are investigating the death of a tribal leader who was shot at a military base after being questioned and released.

headline.seo: Afghan Insurgent Is Killed on an American-Led Base
headline.main: Afghan Insurgent Is Killed on U.S.-Led Military Base
headline.print_headline: Afghan Insurgent Is Killed On U.S.-Led Military Base

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
